module.name: Info Services
module.description: Provides a number of applications accessable by feature codes: company directory, call trace (last call information), echo test, speaking clock, and speak current extension number.
module.changelog: *2.5.0.2* localization updates *2.5.0.1* localization fixes *2.5.0* localization, Swedish *2.4.0.1* #2731 fix press 0 for operator in directory *2.4.0* bumped for 2.4 *1.3.5.2* changed categories *1.3.5.1* bump for rc1 *1.3.5* #2145 add waitexten while waiting for user input, and make uninstallable *1.3.4* changed ${CALLERID(number)} to ${AMPUSER} to accomodate CID number masquerading *1.3.3* Fixed SpeakExtension - replaced depricated ${CALLERID} variable *1.3.2* Fixed SpeakExtension - add macro-user-callerid *1.3.1* Improved accuracy of speaking clock
